name: Legend of the Five Sisters
description:
Created (in a whopping 7 days!) for the Magical Girl Game Jam hosted between August 2022 and September 2022.   Not yet complete~

Known Issues:

  • Battle balance is a bit rough.  I hope that damned snake is beatable.
  • Only 3 out of the intended 5 wave sequences are available.
  • Ko'Reth's Siphon Life can raise dead party members.  (It's not as OP as it sounds, trust me.  She has a much better spell for raising dead party members)
  • Some group healing effects don't show numbers on the caster.  This is only a visual bug, as the caster is healed normally as intended.

So yeah, enjoy!  And most importantly, watch for a better, more complete, more polished version! :D
